entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
